paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and functional studies.

functional_data.summary: Functional evaluation of 186 BRCA2 variants classified into normal/likely normal, intermediate, and abnormal/likely abnormal.

variants.additional_notes: The study evaluated a total of 244 BRCA2 variants, including 186 VUSs.
key_quotes: We classify the functional impact of 186 BRCA2 VUSs with our computational pipeline, resulting in the classification of 126 variants as normal/likely normal, 23 as intermediate, and 37 as abnormal/likely abnormal.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only BRCA2 variants were extracted, and no specific variant notations were provided.
